title: Episode 6: The Science of Fear
description: This week, for Halloween, the Hidden Brain podcast gets spooky. We explore the science of fear — traveling to a haunted house curated by a scientist to investigate what scares us, and why some people enjoy this sensation more than others.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
